comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content:
here she is, upper left photo, left ship facing forward, James W Wadsworth (named after a congressman), better described as a disinfecting ship, something like the plague would not be handled on her but rather referred to Ellis Island.

href="http://freepages.genealogy.rootsweb.ancestry.com/~quarantine/images/maltn05.jpg">freepages.genealogy.rootsweb.ancestry.com/~quarantine/ima...
